TopicTitle: Modify Decoupler to Not Leave Bits Behind

Articles.Content: Anyone know how one might go about making a cfg tweak or module manager config for radial decouplers so that they don't leave those little bits behind when  you stage them?

Don't worry. They DON'T!

At first they there is some 'residue' but when the craft is reloaded all traces of radial decouplers is gone.
Yeah, I know that. I would rather not have to change scenes though.
